{"id":280606236,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 10 months","timestamp":1574341571,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"64 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/280606236/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Island Perimeter","memory":"16 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int islandPerimeter(vector<vector<int>>& grid) {\n        int output = 0;\n        \n        size_t height = grid.size();\n        if(height == 0) return 0;\n        size_t width = grid[0].size();\n        if(width == 0) return 0;\n        \n        if(height == 1) {\n            for(size_t i = 0; i < width; ++i) output += grid[0][i];\n            return output * 2 + 2;\n        }\n        \n        if(width == 1) {\n            for(size_t i = 0; i < height; ++i) output += grid[i][0];\n            return output * 2 + 2;\n        }\n        \n        for(size_t i = 1; i < height; ++i)\n            for(size_t j = 0; j < width; ++j) output += grid[i][j] != grid[i - 1][j];\n        \n        for(size_t j = 1; j < width; ++j)\n            for(size_t i = 0; i < height; ++i) output += grid[i][j] != grid[i][j - 1];\n        \n        for(size_t i = 0; i < height; ++i) output += grid[i][0] + grid[i][width - 1];\n        for(size_t i = 0; i < width; ++i) output += grid[0][i] + grid[height - 1][i];\n        \n        return output;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"island-perimeter"}
